DOC.brief_summary: This trial is testing the safety of combining the oral chemotherapy drug capecitabine with radio-labeled microspheres injected directly into the liver.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Capecitabine in Combination With SIR-Spheres in Patients With Advanced Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Patients with adequate liver function and performance status in whom liver-directed therapy and capecitabine would be appropriate are eligible for this clinical trial.
DOC.criteria: Adequate liver function Adequate performance status Significant extrahepatic disease
